Two leading officials at the Justice Department have resigned.

Hi, Carrie.
Hi, Robert.

And prosecutors there really wanted to build big criminal cases against the violent Mexican drug cartels and the people who illegally bought guns and then passed them on to those cartel members.
But instead, things went badly wrong.
